extendedInfo.description: Magic fireflies on a shamrocks carpet.Enjoy for an Happy St. Patrick's Day !!!Tap and the fireflies will appear closer to your finger.Drag the finger to make a fireflies wake.Shamrocks Live Wallpaper 1.3 totally new!Settings:Shamrocks: -You can change the Shamrocks Type that wander around your screen: Default, Brilliant, 3D and Glowing. -You can change also the number, the size and the speed of the Shamrocks. -You can change the movement. The Shamrocks can go back and forth as if they were moved by the wind, float or moving on the screen with gravity effect.Frame: - You can add a nice sparkling frame to your phone screen. - You can set the effect of the frame sparkling.Background:- added 4 new green backgrounds- Gold four-leaf clover (Enable/Disable from settings)Sound: - You can enable sound and when you pop or move the shamrocks the LWP plays a little sound (according with your ringtone volume - if the phone are in silent mode, the LWP doesn't play any sound).Enjoy Shamrock Live Wallpaper!The permission FULL INTERNET ACCESS and VIEW NETWORK STATE are only for the ads present in the Settings.This is my third Live Wallpaper that uses advertising. There is no paid version, but only this full free version. Please don't be sad about ads, they will appear only in the Settings and not on your live wallpaper screen. When you use the live wallpaper as live background on your phone, it doesn't access to internet. NO AIRPUSH.TO OPEN:- please click the Home button of your phone, - then click the Menu button and select Wallpapers,- now choose Live Wallpapers section and find your Shamrock Live Wallpaper and enjoy an happy St. Patty Day !!!If you cannot see the Live WallPapers section, your phone doesn't support the Live WallPapers.

reviews.title: Fun wallpaper for March
reviews.comment: Fun wallpaper for March, Celts and anyone who likes the Luck of the Shamrock on their phone. Some nice background images to choose from. Set the number of clovers and fireflies to float across your screen. Along with a special gold 4 leaf clover! I like it! - Now that the month is over, I\'m really going to miss the magic sound on my phone. It would be ever so lovely to have similar sound options on your other wallpaper!
reviews.author: Vickie Carey

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: So pretty! Love that it has so many configuration options. Only problem is that there seem to be random glitches in the configuration. I\'ll select the same option and get ugly flashing shamrocks or lovely sparkling ones. Can\'t figure out what\'s wrong. :(   EDIT: Whatever it was resolved. Recent attempts to change configuration - love options! - matched what it said it was.
reviews.author: Sharon Willoughby
